title: The Second Sneak-Peek of Startup Design Framework
description: You can decide whether to create your site using UI Kit blocks or samples.

textBoxes.title: Easy to use
textBoxes.text: To get started, you select the desired sample and base the entire website on it. Itâ€™s that simple!

textBoxes.title: Feel our design
textBoxes.text: Samples will show you the feeling on how to play around using the components in the website building process.

textBoxes.title: Variety of designs
textBoxes.text: Responsive web design is a web design approach aimed to provide crafting sites.
